constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 146 (Friday, August 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MOORE of Wisconsin:
H.R. 5024.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress enacts this bill pursuant to Sections 7 & 8 of
Article I of the United States Constitution and Amendment XVI
of the United States Constitution.
[Page H4331]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow for payments to certain individuals who dye fuel, and for other purposes.
